name: Agent Blue
description:
The toxic chemical Agent Blue is being used by a private military corporation to power their deadly machines. You've been sent to shut them down. 

Controls:

WASD to Move

E to use your Knife, hit buttons, enter trucks

Click to fire

Hold Control to stop and free-aim

Right Click to throw grenades in free-aim

Q to use activate or deactivate equipped device

I to open inventory

C to toggle prone

Hold Shift to run

In Inventory:

Left Click on weapons and devices to switch ammo type, swap active weapon / device.

Left Click on grenades to select active grenade.

When not in a level, Right Click on pickups or equipped weapons or devices to drop them. 

Art by LightningFenrir

Music and SFX by 200sc

Code by Implausiblyfun, 200sc

Built using Oak.

This game was built as in parallel with the mentioned game engine, Oak.
